articles.title: Asian Games 2023 Live Updates, Day 11: Neeraj Chopra wins gold with 88.88m throw, Jena finishes with silver in javelin final; men’s 4×400 relay team get gold, women’s team bags silver - The Indian Express
articles.description: Asian Games 2023 Day 11 Live Updates: The Indian men's hockey team avoided a potential banana peel to defeat South Korea in the semi-final of the men's hockey event at the Asian Games on Wednesday.

articles.title: Hangzhou Asian Games: India enter men's hockey final with hard-fought 5-3 win over South Korea - Times of India
articles.description: Asian Games 2023 News: India defeated South Korea 5-3 in a hard-fought semifinal to enter the title clash of the men's hockey competition at the Asian Games in Hangzhou on W

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Lovlina gets historic silver, Parveen takes bronze as boxers end with 5 medals - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Indian boxing team ended their Asian Games 2023 campaign with 5 medals (1 silver, 4 bronze). The boxers also earned 4 boxing quotas for the Paris Olympics.
articles.content: Lovlina Borgohain had a smile on her face throughout the women's 75kg final against China's Li Qian. Not because she was dominating the contest but because she got an early indication that marginal c… [+3646 chars]

articles.title: India's best ever Asian Games medals tally, is thanks to Indian athletics coming of age - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Nearly a third (23) of India's 71 medals at the 2023 Asian Games so far have come from track and field events.
articles.content:
Even before the superstar Neeraj Chopra takes the field, Indian athletes have recorded their best-ever haul at the Asian Games with some breathtaking performances.

articles.title: Ripple obtains full license to operate in Singapore as it expands in Asia-Pacific - CNBC
